title: Wear Charge Checker
summary: Get notified if your smartwatch isn't charging by a certain time each night
description: Set a time, then get notified if your Android Wear device is not charging at that time each night.Great if you frequently forget to charge your watch, or you want to make sure its seated on its charger properly
descriptionHTML:
Set a time, then get notified if your Android Wear device is not charging at that time each night.
Great if you frequently forget to charge your watch, or you want to make sure its seated on its charger properly
comments: Great app Helps me not be stupid.  I can always use help with that.  :)
recentChanges: Fixed bug with app not checking wearable battery after phone restart
